tasks.task: Women farmers in Bihar gain recognition and improve livelihoods through technology adoption.
subtasks: Women farmers obtain recognition as farmers in their own right.
Women farmers access technologies like machine transplanting and direct seeding.
Women farmers adopt good agronomic practices, improve nursery management.
Women farmers gain confidence and save time/energy.
Women farmers use saved time to improve household care and personal well-being.
Women farmers form self-help groups to purchase machine transplanter.
Women start custom hiring center providing machine transplanting services.
Women contribute to filling service gaps in the community.
Women gain credibility and respect in patriarchal society.
Women overcome social barriers by persisting in traditionally male roles.
Women access inputs, technologies, land, and financial services.
Women make decisions on production, sales, and income use.
Technologies deployment among women leads to improved power relations.
